mapper.update:
update catalogcopy
Event_id = #{eventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Save_time = #{saveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Eq_type = #{eqType,jdbcType=CHAR},
O_time = #{oTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
O_time_ns = #{oTimeNs,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Lon = #{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Depth = #{depth,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Ml = #{ml,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Ms = #{ms,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Md = #{md,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Mb = #{mb,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
mmB = #{mmb,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Mw = #{mw,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
M = #{m,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Dmin = #{dmin,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Gap_azi = #{gapAzi,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Rms = #{rms,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Erh = #{erh,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Erz = #{erz,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Qloc = #{qloc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Qnet = #{qnet,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Qcom = #{qcom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Sum_stn = #{sumStn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Used_stn = #{usedStn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Sum_pha = #{sumPha,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Used_pha = #{usedPha,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Explosion_flag = #{explosionFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Epic_id = #{epicId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jsonstate = #{jsonstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Source_id = #{sourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Location_cname = #{locationCname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isouttem = #{isouttem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where Cata_id = #{cataId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update catalogcopy set Event_id = #{eventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Save_time = #{saveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Eq_type = #{eqType,jdbcType=CHAR}, O_time = #{oTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, O_time_ns = #{oTimeNs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Lon = #{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Depth = #{depth,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Ml = #{ml,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Ms = #{ms,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Md = #{md,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Mb = #{mb,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, mmB = #{mmb,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Mw = #{mw,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, M = #{m,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Dmin = #{dmin,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Gap_azi = #{gapAzi,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Rms = #{rms,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Erh = #{erh,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Erz = #{erz,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Qloc = #{qloc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Qnet = #{qnet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Qcom = #{qcom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Sum_stn = #{sumStn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Used_stn = #{usedStn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Sum_pha = #{sumPha,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Used_pha = #{usedPha,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Explosion_flag = #{explosionFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Epic_id = #{epicId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jsonstate = #{jsonstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Source_id = #{sourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Location_cname = #{locationCname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isouttem = #{isouttem,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where Cata_id = #{cataId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from catalogcopy
AND Event_id LIKE '%${eventId}%'
LIMIT #{start} ,#{limit}
